title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

K.T. McFarland: Trump had us on the way to peace in the Middle East, Biden has brought back war. Jen Psaki: Biden using "quiet diplomacy". Rush annihilated Hillary's notion of soft diplomacy. Reagan's legacy: Israel's Iron Dome works. Rush on leftists who wanted Israel to share Iron Dome with Hamas. Biden: Unvaccinated will "pay price". Psaki on covid passports. Cuomo reopens Radio City Music Hall -- to the vaccinated only. Rush on never living your life in fear. Conservative caller doesn't see a coherent message in opposition to Biden. James Golden's new podcast on Rush available now, new episodes available on Wednesdays. Rush on his trip to Israel.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Dershowitz on the virulent antisemitism of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and The Squad. Rush on what he learned on his trip to Israel. Larry Summers on the dangers of inflation. Rush to Millennials: All of this government spending isn't sustainable. How can we expect anyone to work if we pay them so much not to work? How do we hold local leaders accountable? Rush on the revolt against the ruling class.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Rush on how late-night comedy shows were no longer about ratings, but bragging rights for the elites. SNL falls to lowest ratings ever. Arrogant Cuomo laughs off sexual harassment allegations. Rush on Cuomo's arrogance while implementing policies that hurt people. Trucker on help wanted signs all over the country. NYC gay parade bans cops. Rush on the intolerance of the left. Caller with breathing problems doesn't want to wear a mask. EIB High Note: Retirement home for horses. The only avenue we have for changing the course of the country is elections.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
